titles.title: To provide for the treatment of Indian tribal governments under section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the treatment of an Indian tribal government as a tax-exempt organization for purposes of provisions relating to the taxability of a beneficiary under an annuity purchased by a tax-exempt organization.
